title: Nova Scotia closing all visitor information centres   HalifaxToday ca
description: Nova Scotia closing all visitor information centres HalifaxToday ca Three presumptive COVID   cases in Nova Scotia CTV News Nova Scotia lobster processors call for a halt to harvesting as market for shellfish collapses amid COVID   pandemic The Globe and Ma
content: Due to concerns around COVID    all visitor information centres will be closed effective Tuesday  March   There are only a few centres open year round  including one in Amherst nearthe New Brunswick border and one at Halifax Stanfield International Airpo    chars
